reference.shortdesc: The info element provides additional information about the step.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The info element is specialized from the itemgroup element in the topic module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <step><cmd>Type a name for the widget.</cmd> <info>The widget name is created when you configure the widget in the Widget Configuration Dialog. It is not an actual class name or file name, just a label for the widget as used in this application.</info> </step>
